resources.string: This channel is to indicate whether the foreground service is running or not.

Host service is activated. Press Deactivate or Destruct to mutate its status.
 If You deactivate the host, it will be put into sleep mode until you manually activate it again.
 If You destruct the host, it will be totally destroyed and you have to manually activate it again.
 The difference between deactivate and destruct is that the deactivate will be put the host into sleep mode,
 which means a sleep notification will be shown upon device reboot.
Host service has never been activated.
Host service is on sleep mode.
Oh, no, our host is killing us. But no worry, let us keep fingers crossed that ourhost will resurrect on device reboot.
Let\'s do something awesome without worrying about being killed brutally by Android System.
